pages.title: Reload Time I
pages.text: Cooling down the parts of the loading and shooting mechanisms, this decreases the reload time by 15%.$(br2)$(o)Note: The $(l:turrets/forcefield)Forcefield Turret$(/l) will use these to faster regenerate its shield instead.$()

pages.title: Reload Time II
pages.text: Further decreases the reload time by 35% (in total: 50%).$(br2)$(5)$(o)Requires Reload Time I$()
